AVRU4U6U7 Directory Reference

AT90USBXXX6, AT90USBXXX7 and ATMEGAXXU4 AVR model peripheral driver files.

More...

Files

file  ADC.h
 

ADC peripheral driver for the U7, U6 and U4 USB AVRs.


file  TWI.h
 

TWI peripheral driver for the U7, U6 and U4 USB AVRs.


Detailed Description

This folder contains drivers for several of the AVR internal peripherals such as the USART, compatible only with the AT90USBXXX6, AT90USBXXX7 and ATMEGAXXU4 USB AVR models, such as the AT90USB1287. Its contents should not be included by the user application - the dispatch header file located in the parent directory should be used instead.
